info.title: Letter Of Credit (OpenAPI 3.0.2)
info.description: The Letter of Credit business API allows  public user to perform different kinds of actions with in the  import/export letter context .

406.description: Respones can't served with requested media type.

500.description: Internal Server Error - error during prozessing of request

post.description: Endpoint with the the facility to create a Letter of Credit resource with in the Rabobank system.

parameters.name: Rabobank-Flow-ID
parameters.description: external identifier that is handed over to FCUBS for traceability

patching this value is not allowed.

Shipment.description: Detailed location and timing information about the shipment of the goods.

transferable.description:
This field identifies whether or not transshipment is allowed under the documentary credit. **(43T)**
***
Sort order:
  * `Y` - Allowed
  * `N` - Not Allowed
  * `C` - Conditional

partial.description:
This field specifies whether or not partial shipments are allowed under the documentary credit. **(43P)**
***
Sort order:
  * `Y` - Allowed
  * `N` - Not Allowed
  * `C` - Conditional

from.description: Place of taking goods in Charge / Place of receipt **(44A)**

to.description: Place of final destination / Place of delivery **(44A)**

latest_shipment_at.description:
This field identifies the latest date for loading on board/dispatch/taking in charge. **(44C)**
Format : "yyyy-MM-dd"

period.description: This field specifies the period of time during which the goods are to be loaded on board / despatched / taken in charge. **(44D)**

Good.title: Good
Good.description: Detailed list of goods that are part of the shipment with in the context of the LC.

Party.title: Party
Party.description: Includes detailes about the Applicant, Beneficiary and Issuing Bank

amount.description: Amount of the guaranteed payment between buyer/seller. **(32B)**

commission_type.description:
Definition for the way of commission.
***
Sort order:
  * `ML01` - Import LC issuance - Non Revolving - Commission in advance
  * `ML02` - Import LC issuance - Non Revolving - Commission in arrears

product.description:
Definition of the LC kind.
***
Sort order:
  * `I` - "Import letter"
  * `E` - "Export letter"

period_for_presentation.description: Specifies the number of calendar days after the date of shipment within which the documents must be presented for payment, acceptance or negotiation. **(48)**

expired_at.description: Specify the expiry date for the facility. If the limit amount assigned to the facility is not utilized within the specified expiry date then the Available check box will remain un-selected. This freezes the line for the respective liability. ISO8601 based date format(\"yyyy-MM-dd\"). **(31D)**

expiry_place.description: This field specifies the place where documents may be presented. **(31D)**

confirmation_instructions.description:
Contains confirmation instructions for the Receiver. **(49)**
***
Sort order:
  * `Y` - The Receiver is requested to confirm the credit/ may add confirmation to the credit.
  * `N` - The Receiver is not requested to confirm the credit.

additional_amounts_covered.description: Specify any additional amounts covered such as insurance, freight, interest, etc. **(39C)**

credit_available_with.description: Identify the bank with which the credit is available **(41a)**

credit_available_by.description:
Indicates of how the credit is available. **(41a)**
***
Sort order:
  * `P` - Sight Payment
  * `A` - Acceptance
  * `D` - Deferred Payment
  * `M` - Mixed Payment
  * `N` - Negotiation

transferable.description:
This field specifies the form of the credit. Transferable Yes or No **(40A)**
***
Sort order:
  * `Y` - Yes
  * `N` - No

issued_at.description:
The letter of credit issue date.
ISO8601 based date format(("yyyy-MM-dd")). **(31C)**

applicable_rule.description:
Indicate the rules that governs the letter of credit. **(40E)**
***
Sort order:
  * `EUCP LATEST VERSION` - 
  * `EUCPURR LATEST VERSION` - 
  * `ISP LATEST VERSION` -
  * `OTHR` - Credit is subject to any other rules
  * `UCP LATEST VERSION` -
  * `UCPURR LATEST VERSION` -

positive_tolerance.description: Used to specify the tolerance relative to the documentary credit amount as a percentage plus and/or minus that amount. **(39A)**

negative_tolerance.description: Used to specify the tolerance relative to the documentary credit amount as a percentage plus and/or minus that amount. **(39A)**

additional_condition_beneficiary.description: Description of further conditions of the documentary credit - beneficiary. **(49G)**

additional_condition_receiving.description: Description of further conditions of the documentary credit - receiving.  **(49H)**

goods.description: Detailed list of goods that are part of the shipment with in the context of the LC.

example.additional_condition_beneficiary: All documents must be dated and signed.
example.additional_condition_receiving: All documents must indicate the beneficiarys name.

documents.clauses: FULL SET OF CLEAN ON BOARD OCEAN BILLS OF LADING MADE OUT TO THE ORDER OF KEB HANA BANK  MARKED FREIGHT PREPAID

amount.description: Amount of the guaranteed payment between buyer/seller.

If the limit amount assigned to the facility is not utilized within the specified expiry date then the Available check box will remain un-selected. This freezes the line for the respective liability. ISO8601 based date format(\"yyyy-MM-dd\"). **(31D)**

issued_at.description: Date when the amendment has been requested to be sent to its destination. **(30)**

plus_tolerance.description: Used to specify the tolerance relative to the documentary credit amount as a percentage plus that amount. **(39A)**

minus_tolerance.description: Used to specify the tolerance relative to the documentary credit amount as a percentage minus that amount. **(39A)**

credit_available_by.description:
Indicates of how the credit is available. **(41a)**
***
Sort order:
  * `P` - Sight Payment

  * `M` - Mixed Payment
  * `N` - Negotiation

This field specifies the form of the credit. Transferable Yes or No **(40A)**

Sort order:
  * `Y` - Yes
  * `N` - No

additional_amounts_covered.description: Specifies amendments to any additional amounts covered, such as insurance, freight, interest, etc. **(39C)**

additional_condition_beneficiary.description: Description of further conditions of the documentary credit - beneficiary. **(49M)**

additional_condition_receiving.description: Description of further conditions of the documentary credit - receiving.  **(49N)**

payment_details.description: specifies the payment dates, amounts and/or method for their determination in a documentary credit which is available by mixed payment, if these elements have changed. **(42M)**

error_code.description: 6-digit system internal error code, for issue handling with Rabobank

error_type.description: Description of what kind of error occured

error_display.description: Enriched error description for the enduser

state.description:
Information about the actual progressing state of the LC amendment.
***
We differentiate between two LC states:
* `DRAFT` - Amendment was succesfully created and is waiting to be authorized
* `ISSUED` - Amendment was succesfully authorized. Amendments can be applyed.
* `REJECT` - Amend was rejected.
* `CLOSED` - Amend was closed.

amendment_number.description: Specifies the number which identifies this amendment. **(26E)**

expired_at.description: Specify the expiry date for the facility. If the limit amount assigned to the facility is not utilized within the specified expiry date then the Available check box will remain un-selected. This freezes the line for the respective liability. \r\nISO8601 based date format(\"yyyy-MM-dd\"). **(31D)**

expiry_place.description: This field specifies the place where documents may be presented. **(31D)**

issued_at.description: Date when the amendment has been requested to be sent to its destination. **(30)**

amount.description: Amount of the guaranteed payment between buyer/seller.

amount_deviation.description: This field contains the amount of an increase/decrease in the documentary credit amount, if changed . **(32A)** **(33A)**

plus_tolerance.description: Used to specify the tolerance relative to the documentary credit amount as a percentage plus that amount. **(39A)**

minus_tolerance.description: Used to specify the tolerance relative to the documentary credit amount as a percentage minus that amount. **(39A)**

credit_available_with.description: Identify the bank with which the credit is available **(41a)**

credit_available_by.description:
Indicates of how the credit is available. **(41a)**
***
Sort order:
  * `P` - Sight Payment
  * `A` - Acceptance
  * `D` - Deferred Payment
  * `M` - Mixed Payment
  * `N` - Negotiation

additional_condition_beneficiary.description: Description of further conditions of the documentary credit - beneficiary. **(49M)**

additional_condition_receiving.description: Description of further conditions of the documentary credit - receiving.  **(49N)**

cancellation_request.description: This field specifies that the instrument is requested to be cancelled.  **(23S)**

Indicate the rules that governs the letter of credit. **(40E)**
***
Sort order:

  * `OTHR` - Credit is subject to any other rules

amount.description: Amount of the guaranteed payment between buyer/seller. **(32B)**

state.description:
Information about the actual progressing state of the LC.
***
We differentiate between two LC states:
  * `DRAFT` - LC was succesfully created and is waiting to be authorized
  * `ISSUED` - LC was succesfully authorized. Amendments can be applyed.
  * `REJECT` - LC was rejected.
  * `CLOSED` - LC was closed.

expired_at.description:
Specify the expiry date for the facility. If the limit amount assigned to the facility
is not utilized within the specified expiry date then the Available check box will
remain un-selected. This freezes the line for the respective liability. ISO8601 based
date format("yyyy-MM-dd"). **(31D)**

expiry_place.description: This field specifies the place where documents may be presented. **(31D)**

issued_at.description:
The letter of credit issue date.
ISO8601 based date format(("yyyy-MM-dd")). **(31C)**

positive_tolerance.description: Used to specify the tolerance relative to the documentary credit amount as a percentage plus and/or minus that amount. **(39A)**

negative_tolerance.description: Used to specify the tolerance relative to the documentary credit amount as a percentage plus and/or minus that amount. **(39A)**

additional_condition_receiving.description: Description of further conditions of the documentary credit - receiving.  **(49H)**

period_for_presentation.description: Specifies the number of calendar days after the date of shipment within which the documents must be presented for payment, acceptance or negotiation. **(48)**

goods.description: Detailed list of goods that are part of the shipment with in the context of the LC.
